rows.label: qst710205_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes, this is it. This is
the scenery of Iira that
was always in our hearts...

rows.label: qst710205_msg0003
rows.name:
There are things that even
Metsu cannot destroy...

rows.label: qst710205_msg0004
rows.name: It seems to be teaching us that.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0005
rows.name:
You're right... We can't
lose this sight again.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0006
rows.name:
Seeing the fish swim energetically
will surely liven up the
people of the city...

rows.label: qst710205_msg0008
rows.name:
To bring back the city's
vitality, we first have to
look forward ourselves...

rows.label: qst710205_msg0009
rows.name:
Still, you all have
helped me out again.

rows.label: qst710205_msg0010
rows.name:
I'll take good care of the fish
you gave me. Thank you so much...
